headline.main: Afghan Official Says Taliban Attacks Killed 12 Policemen
headline.print_headline: Afghan Official Says Taliban Attacks Killed 12 Policemen

docs.snippet: A string of coordinated Taliban attacks on police checkpoints in the increasingly volatile southern Afghan province of Helmand killed at least 12 policemen, an official said Monday....
docs.lead_paragraph: A string of coordinated Taliban attacks on police checkpoints in the increasingly volatile southern Afghan province of Helmand killed at least 12 policemen, an official said Monday.

headline.main: Reconstruction of Ruined Palace Begins in Afghan Capital
headline.print_headline: Reconstruction of Ruined Palace Begins in Afghan Capital

docs.snippet: Afghan President Ashraf Ghani dedicated an ambitious reconstruction project on Monday to restore the ruins of historic Darul Aman palace, an initiative aimed at signaling a new future for the war-torn country....
docs.lead_paragraph: Afghan President Ashraf Ghani dedicated an ambitious reconstruction project on Monday to restore the ruins of historic Darul Aman palace, an initiative aimed at signaling a new future for the war-torn country.

headline.main: German Anti-Migrant Party Stirs Anger With Comment on Black Soccer Star
headline.print_headline: German Anti-Migrant Party Stirs Anger With Comment on Black Soccer Star

docs.snippet: Germany's main anti-immigrant party stirred outrage on Sunday when its vice-chairman said people would not want German black soccer star Jerome Boateng as their neighbour....
docs.lead_paragraph: Germany's main anti-immigrant party stirred outrage on Sunday when its vice-chairman said people would not want German black soccer star Jerome Boateng as their neighbour.

headline.main: Leadership Row in Turkey's Nationalist Opposition Helps Erdogan
headline.print_headline: Leadership Row in Turkey's Nationalist Opposition Helps Erdogan

docs.snippet: Turkey's nationalist opposition on Monday blocked a move by party dissidents to hold a special congress next month to try to oust its veteran leader, dragging out a dispute that is key to President Tayyip Erdogan's ambitions for greater powers....
docs.lead_paragraph: Turkey's nationalist opposition on Monday blocked a move by party dissidents to hold a special congress next month to try to oust its veteran leader, dragging out a dispute that is key to President Tayyip Erdogan's ambitions for greater powers.

headline.main: 'Blade Jumper' Rehm Says Study Shows No Advantage
headline.print_headline: 'Blade Jumper' Rehm Says Study Shows No Advantage

docs.snippet: Paralympic long jump champion Markus Rehm enhanced his claim for a spot at the Rio Olympics on Monday when the German revealed that a wide-ranging study indicated prosthesis-wearing athletes had no clear advantage over able-bodied competitors....
docs.lead_paragraph: Paralympic long jump champion Markus Rehm enhanced his claim for a spot at the Rio Olympics on Monday when the German revealed that a wide-ranging study indicated prosthesis-wearing athletes had no clear advantage over able-bodied competitors.

headline.main: Spain's Prado Unveils Major Exhibit of Dutch Master Bosch
headline.print_headline: Spain's Prado Unveils Major Exhibit of Dutch Master Bosch

docs.snippet: It may not be the most suitable exhibit for the squeamish but the Prado Museum's 500th anniversary display of the most and best of Dutch Renaissance master Hieronymus Bosch is definitely a must for art lovers, and maybe gore freaks too....
docs.lead_paragraph: It may not be the most suitable exhibit for the squeamish but the Prado Museum's 500th anniversary display of the most and best of Dutch Renaissance master Hieronymus Bosch is definitely a must for art lovers, and maybe gore freaks too.

headline.main: England's Clyne Plays Down Burnout Fears Ahead of Euro 2016
headline.print_headline: England's Clyne Plays Down Burnout Fears Ahead of Euro 2016

docs.snippet: Right back Nathaniel Clyne has played down fears he may suffer a burnout during England's European Championship campaign in France after playing a lot of games in his first season at Premier League club Liverpool....
docs.lead_paragraph: Right back Nathaniel Clyne has played down fears he may suffer a burnout during England's European Championship campaign in France after playing a lot of games in his first season at Premier League club Liverpool.

headline.main: Hamilton Victory Also a Boost for His Mechanics
headline.print_headline: Hamilton Victory Also a Boost for His Mechanics

docs.snippet: Winning the Monaco Grand Prix transformed Lewis Hamilton's Formula One season and also provided a timely boost for those working on the triple world champion's side of the Mercedes garage....
docs.lead_paragraph: Winning the Monaco Grand Prix transformed Lewis Hamilton's Formula One season and also provided a timely boost for those working on the triple world champion's side of the Mercedes garage.

headline.main: Egyptian Court Sentences 36 Islamists to Life in Prison
headline.print_headline: Egyptian Court Sentences 36 Islamists to Life in Prison

docs.snippet: An Egyptian court has convicted and sentenced 36 Islamists, including a top leader of the outlawed Muslim Brotherhood, to life imprisonment....
docs.lead_paragraph: An Egyptian court has convicted and sentenced 36 Islamists, including a top leader of the outlawed Muslim Brotherhood, to life imprisonment.

headline.main: Spanish Man in Rush for Plane Causes Cologne Security Scare
headline.print_headline: Spanish Man in Rush for Plane Causes Cologne Security Scare

docs.snippet: A Spanish man in a rush for his plane caused a security scare at Germany's Cologne-Bonn airport Monday when he skirted security screening, causing authorities to shut down and evacuate a terminal and stop all departures from it for more than two h...
docs.lead_paragraph: A Spanish man in a rush for his plane caused a security scare at Germany's Cologne-Bonn airport Monday when he skirted security screening, causing authorities to shut down and evacuate a terminal and stop all departures from it for more than two hours, police said.
